Anyone tried this on a PS3? Most of the BD rips of this have Cinavia copy protection and PS3s crap out during playback. Thanks for any info.

Instructions:
1. Download & Install "PS3 Media Server" on Windows or Mac (Download page is at the bottom of the description)
2. Run "PS3 Media Server" & go to 'Navigation and share settings" and choose which folders/folder you'd like to share.
3. Go to your "Video" Section on the PS3 and run the open the 'Media Server' Folder.
4. Done

Download Page- http://code.google.com/p/ps3mediaserver/downloads/list

Good luck :)

MkVMe I want to know which software i can use to convert my videos to MKV format with high quality and small size before i upload. Thanx.

I use handbrake, but you can use MeGUI or anything, you just need to tweak the settings to your likings.  Do tests with a small HD video and keep retesting until you get that small size and quality you want.

Terrible quality, pixelated and jerky picture. What's the point in making 720p rips with such a low bitrate? High resolution alone doesn't make for a good viewing experience. I'd rather choose an 700 meg Xvid/.avi rip over this any day. I don't get you people...

I do not agree with Xlemonad. I did not find this video to be choppy and detail was far better than the SD releases I have found so far. The closest I found was an SD which was 1.2 gb. This one is only 577 mb.

Also, watching this on my computer, I had no idea that the audio bitrate was so low. I didn't react at all and was quite surprised when I discovered it, so no reason for concern there.

Great work.
